dict.acceptation: 在…之前；先于，优于；当着…的面；与其…；
在…之前；在…以前；比…早些；与其…；

sent.orig: Before you blame, comfort. Before you criticize, praise. Before you admonish, commend. Before you command, respect.
sent.trans: 责备的话中要带有抚慰，批评的话中要带有赞扬，训诫的话中要带有推崇，命令的话中要带有尊重。

sent.orig: He was impassible before victory, before danger, before defeat.
sent.trans: 他面对胜利、危险、失败均能处之泰然。

sent.orig: He is impassible before victory, before danger, before defeat.
sent.trans: 他面对胜利、危险、败北均能处之泰然。

sent.orig: Before football shoe, palm and heel are round rubber hammer entirely before.
sent.trans: 以往的足球鞋，前掌和后跟全部都是圆胶钉。

sent.orig: Such a display has never been seen before/never before been seen.
